name: Traceur (isusan)
description:
Dscription

Traceur places the player in various sceneries, where they have to overcome many obstacles with parkour movements and pick up all collective objects in the scene while the music is playing.

Features

  • Low barrier to entry with levels for more casual players
  • Online leaderboards for players to compete against players
  • Traceur will use a dynamic camera angles for the most parkour movements.
  • Character customization for both man and woman. 
  • Online store that the players can be able to get extra cosmetics and other sceneries to play.
  • The difficulty for Traceur will be set in 2 categories. The players can play with 'Auto Move' option i.e.,If the option is activated, the character can do the parkour move with no player intervention.
